title: Fundamentals of Robot Navigation Algorithms: Environment Exploration Based on Ultrasonic Sensors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational robotics knowledge, introductory programming skills, and understanding of sensor operation principles
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education focusing on indoor environment mapping with ultrasonic sensors and understanding obstacle-avoidance algorithms.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of grid-based map generation algorithms and simulate simple environments
Learners can implement a process for estimating obstacle locations by interpreting ultrasonic sensor data
Learners can design robot navigation paths in unpredictable environments by applying behavioral learning algorithms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
